sama abhiyogayakatama muhunademin, prashna nirakaranaya karaganimin katayuthu kala ohu, ruju prathipaththi matha hindimin siya wagakima awankawa ma karagena giya.ohu siya puwathpath kala diwiya thula wiwidha sancharawalata da ekwuna. 1974di nangenahira jarmaniye kala wruththiya adhyapana, sancharaya, 1978di kapilawasthu sarwagnya dhathu aapasu wadamawanawita ema nila niyojitha pirise samajikayaku lesath, 1981di iraka jathika dina uthsawaya sandaha shri lankawe niyojithayaku lesa sahabhagi wima, 1983di pilipinaye parisara samuluwa, 1985di amerikawe pawathi antharjathika amuththan piliganime samuluwa aadiyata sahabhagi wimata ethumata haki wuna. 1992di nawadilli nuwara, 1994di kathmandu nuwara, 1989di kwalalampur nuwara pawathi samulu sandaha da hethema ekwuna.lekhawus aayathanaye madhya upadeshakawarayaku lesa 1994 desambar palamuwani dina pathwunu perera mahatha, 1995 sita warshika prakashana anshaye pradhana kathuwaraya wuna. 1975 sita 1982 dakwa dinamina wesak kalapaya sanskaranaya kaleda methumayi. 1995di prakashana dwarayen palawuna ‘shri lankawe dahawani parlimenthuwa granthaye sama kathuwaraya bawata ethuma pathwuna.
